info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 03 at 6:44PM CST until March 04 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR EASTERN OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE... The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Fire Weather Watch for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Beaver. * 20 Foot Winds...South 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 27 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...2 to 3. * Timing...12 PM to 7 PM CST Friday.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that the potential for critical fire weather conditions exists. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
